title: Wallpaper City Guide Typeface
content:
Hello everyone,

Does anyone know what typeface is used in the very beautiful Wallpaper City Guides?  
Here's a sample on the cover. I'm talking about BARCELONA, not the logotype. I think it's the same used for the body text.

Thanks in advance,

Vincent

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020160326im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Wallpaper_City_Guides_6544.png)
author: vbschan
